hints.text: Welcome to Boolean! This is a game about sending signals. This tutorial will go through what you need to succeed. Good luck!
Move around with WASD or arrow buttons.
Zoom in and out with SHIFT + MOUSE SCROLL.
Use MOUSE SCROLL to change which tile you place.
Try placing some tiles by using LEFT MOUSE BUTTON on the grid.
Change the direction of the tile you want to place by using Q and E.
Press SPACE to open up the inventory. Drag what tiles you want from the inventory onto the actionbar by holding LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.
Delete a placed tile by hovering over it and pressing R.
You can undo most changes by using SHIFT + Z.
You can move placed tiles by selecting the Move symbol on the actionbar and dragging the tile.
You can select multiple tiles by selecting the Select symbol (green square) on the actionbar and dragging LEFT MOUSE BUTTON over the grid.
You can delete the tiles in a selection by pressing R when you have a selection up.
You can move a selection by holding LEFT MOUSE BUTTON on the blue move symbol on the selection.
You can duplicate a selection by pressing LEFT MOUSE BUTTON on the blue dupe symbol on the selection. Then use the move symbol to move the new dupe.
That concludes the basic tutorial. Next up is the first puzzle!
